snippet.title: Pneumata (Deadbolt Interactive) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
The tenants are going missing, the screams are getting louder, and the building itself keeps changing. There are rumors of a serial killer loose in Milton. Get to the bottom of these grisly murders by investigating Clover Hill Apartments and uncover the horrors that lay beneath the surface.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1183850/Pneumata/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
